channel.title: [PI] Adding my own custom objects

item.title: [PI] Adding my own custom objects
item.dc:creator: @Dragonxile Dragonxile
item.description:
@Dragonxile wrote:

Hey guys, I’ve made some custom models for my server, and i want to add them in as objects… Now I know how to add them and everything but I’m not sure what i write for the int to load the model? Ill give an example

Here are some ints

if (i == MYID) { objectDef.name = "OBECJT NAME"; objectDef.itemActions[0] = "CLICK OBJECT"; }

Im not sure what i write in to add the object model??

EDIT: Never mind i worked it out

Read full topic
